item.title: Loop from periodic function and offset (Processing)
item.description: This tutorial is about explaining a quite general method to make animations that loop perfectly.

item.title: Making a first gif with Processing
item.description: This tutorial is about making a basic perfectly looping gif with Processing : a dot doing a circular loop.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Here’s a place to find my animations, information and tutorials about them, and maybe plots and stills in the future.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Etienne Jacob from France. I’m 26 years old, engineer from Ecole des Ponts (I have studied computer science, applied maths and data science).
